> **Problem-oriented guides** - Practical solutions for specific tasks

## Available Guides

### Development

- **[Docker Setup](DOCKER_SETUP.md)** - Configure and manage Docker environment
- **[Generate API Documentation](GENERATE_API_DOCS.md)** - Export OpenAPI/Swagger specifications

### Project Planning

- **[Implementation Tasks](transaction-service-tasks.md)** - Development task tracking and planning
- **[Partitioning Strategy](creative-transaction-partitioning.md)** - Database partitioning design (approved)

---

## How-To Guide Principles

Our how-to guides follow these principles:

✅ **Goal-oriented**: Solve a specific problem

✅ **Practical**: Focus on doing, not explaining why

✅ **Flexible**: Adapt to different situations

✅ **Action-focused**: Series of concrete steps

✅ **Results-driven**: Get something done

## What How-To Guides Are NOT

❌ Not learning materials (see [Tutorials](../tutorials/))

❌ Not comprehensive reference (see [Reference](../reference/))

❌ Not conceptual explanation (see [Explanation](../explanation/))

## Finding the Right Guide

**I want to...**

| Task | Guide |
|------|-------|
| Set up Docker | [Docker Setup](DOCKER_SETUP.md) |
| Generate API docs | [Generate API Documentation](GENERATE_API_DOCS.md) |
| Contribute code | [Contributing](CONTRIBUTING.md) |
| Track development tasks | [Implementation Tasks](transaction-service-tasks.md) |
| Understand partitioning | [Partitioning Strategy](creative-transaction-partitioning.md) |
